items.title: 1st LD Writethru: European Parliament delays decision on EU-U.S. trade deal
items.summary: BRUSSELS, Jan. 26 (Xinhua) -- The European Parliament has delayed until next week a decision on whether to restart work on the EU-U.S. trade deal, after pausing its approval process last week, in protest over U.S. President Donald Trump's push to acquire Greenland and his tariff threats against European allies, according to a senior lawmaker on Monday. This highly-compact model only hit the market in November with a $199 price tag, which has mostly been dropped to $139 or $119 with discounts, though there was a recent prime-exclusive period at this rate before it opened to everyone, as well as the one-time 48-hour $109 flash sale low from mid-December. Jumping on this deal today gives you $86 savings to the best Amazon price we have tracked, landing only $4 above the all-time low. You can also find several more of the brand’s power stations at discounted rates in the official Amazon storefront here.

It comes as a bolstered version of its predecessor, shrunk down from legacy models’ sizes, same as the C1000 Gen 2 station, but with some added benefits not seen on the C1000 Gen 2. items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops PNY’s Switch 2-compatible 256GB Express microSD card down to $48.70 shipped. This is regularly a $60 unit, which is now seeing a 19% markdown. While that may not sound massive, it’s a solid deal that puts this 256GB card just $1 above its all-time low from Black Friday. In fact, it’s now within just $3 the 128GB version that’s currently going for $46. Samsung’s 256GB P9 Express card is available for $39.99 shipped, but PNY’s option is a touch faster for better overall performance. Head below for more details.

more…
